title: Beautiful 938 Sq Foot 2 bed / 1 bath in peaceful quiet neighborhood
posting_body: ['Come home to a great community - Brooks Crossing Apartments!', 'Address:', '8050 Taylor Road', 'Riverdale, GA 30274', 'Beds:', '2  /', 'Baths:', '1 /', 'Size:', '938 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1489', 'Brooks Crossing Apartments is in a fabulous location.', 'Not only are we within walking distance to public transportation , but we are only minutes from Hartsfield Jackson Airport, Clayton State University, Southern Regional Medical and numerous restaurants .', 'Security Deposit:', 'Call', 'Length of Lease:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'Property Features:', '➢ Business Center', '➢ Clubhouse', '➢ Courtyard', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ Gated', '➢ Maintenance on site', '➢ Playground', '➢ Property Manager on Site', '➢ Smoke Free', '➢ Sparkling Pool', '➢ Covered Parking', '➢ Fax/Copy Services', '➢ Laundry Facilities', '➢ Monthly Resident Events', '➢ Multi Use Room', '➢ Online Services', '➢ Package Service', '➢ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '➢ Sports Courts', '➢ Tennis Court', 'Apartment Amenities:', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ Cable Ready', '➢ Ceiling Fans', '➢ Deck', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Disposal', '➢ Fireplace', '➢ Freezer', '➢ Heating', '➢ High Speed Internet Access', '➢ Range', '➢ Refrigerator', '➢ Tub/Shower', '➢ Vaulted Ceilings', '➢ Walk-In Closets', '➢ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '➢ Wi-Fi', '➢ Window Coverings', 'Pets:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Business Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Ready to Lease?', 'Call our office at', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Proudly managed by Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'F9AA760B60A24F']
